requirements.description: Display the service's privacy policy before allowing users to download, install, or sign up for the service.
The privacy policy must include the information collected from users, how it is used and shared (including with X), and contact details for inquiries about their information.
The privacy policy must comply with all applicable laws and be at least as protective as Xâ€™s Privacy Policy and the policies of other services and corporate affiliates.
If unable to comply with the privacy policy requirements, the service must cease access to the X API and the use of all X Content.
